name: Accessibility Review
description: Check UI components for accessibility compliance
content:
Review the accessibility of {{component}}.

**Target compliance:** {{compliance_level}}

**User groups to consider:**
{{user_groups}}

Please check:
1. Keyboard navigation and focus management
2. Screen reader compatibility (ARIA labels, roles)
3. Color contrast and visual accessibility
4. Form labels and error messaging
5. Dynamic content announcements
6. Provide specific fixes for any issues

variables.name: user_groups
variables.label: User Groups
variables.placeholder: Specific user needs to consider (vision, motor, cognitive)?
